duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for overseeing, under the supervision of the Community Manager, the everyday operations and financial functions of the housing community.
Play a vital role in the delinquency and collection of rent to optimize the property's cash flow and financial position.
Manage all phases of the operations, including personnel, leasing, maintenance, financial, administration & risk management, in the absence of the Community Manager.
Supervise all aspects of the property and staff to ensure compliance with the company's policies and procedures, safety and fair housing guidelines, and liability concerns.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Property Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
